1.plot: In the series premiere presented by Gaz Coward on location at a secret location somewhere in England we see as he breaks away from the Paranormal Intent team.

imdb.plot outline: Gaz Coward & Dan Bishop who found fame as the founders and lead investigators of the Paranormal Intent team break away from the team for the first time as a duo to visit some brand new locations as they push the boundaries to bring you an all new experience.
